detectors.description:
YFFCUSDTreward.notifyRewardAmount(uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/YFFCUSDTreward.sol#712-728) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	-rewardRate = reward.div(DURATION) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/YFFCUSDTreward.sol#718)
	-leftover = remaining.mul(rewardRate) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/YFFCUSDTreward.sol#721)

	-[leftover = remaining.mul(rewardRate)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/YFFCUSDTreward.sol#L721)
